channel.title: Npcdrop rates higher then out of 100?
channel.description:
my server runs on drop rates that are out of hundred such as if its 1/100 you have to kill a monster 100 times and and 1 of the 100 kills will give you a item, yet I want to go bigger, so i tryed 1/300 which my math problem went to
x/100=1/300 300x=100 x=100/300 x=.33333333333 and so on
so I put it in as a drop rate (.33), yet after compiling and clicked on rune server i get a error and it won't let me login...how would I fix this? I would like my 1/100 go to at least 1/1000 at max

item.title: Npcdrop rates higher then out of 100?
item.dc:creator: @MrFun MrFun
item.description:
@MrFun wrote:

fixed it had to go into npc handler

item.title: Npcdrop rates higher then out of 100?
item.dc:creator: @MrFun MrFun
item.description:
@MrFun wrote:

my server runs on drop rates that are out of hundred such as if its 1/100 you have to kill a monster 100 times and and 1 of the 100 kills will give you a item, yet I want to go bigger, so i tryed 1/300 which my math problem went to

x/100=1/300
300x=100
x=100/300
x=.33333333333 and so on

so I put it in as a drop rate (.33), yet after compiling and clicked on rune server i get a error and it won’t let me login…how would I fix this? I would like my 1/100 go to at least 1/1000 at max
